nodes.body: @JanKrivanek That's exacty what I wanted, because I think the baselines are removable entirely. Let me try.
The latest arcade update brought in a fix that was preventing the sourcelink package from ever actually updating in arcade.
How about the proposed wildcard change? That went through green
My change should pass on the next arcade flow.
This is ready to merge but I'm not authorized.
@lewing MSBuild PRs need approval by 2 members of team, then get merged by on-duty member (due to VS and sdk insertions considerations)
